title: #742 - Andrew 'Dice' Clay - Dice's Holiday Podcast
description:
Andrew 'Dice' Clay, an iconic stand up comedian and actor, joins Joey Diaz and Lee Syatt LIVE in studio. We also have a surprise visit from a very special guest!
 
This podcast is brought to you by:
 
Manscaped - Get 20% off your first order and a travel bag if you purchase “The Perfect Package” at www.manscaped.com and use the code CHURCH
 
Behind The Irishman podcast - Go behind the scenes with host Sebastian Maniscalco and learn about Martin Scorsese's new Netflix movie "The Irishman." http://smarturl.it/behindtheirishman
